Well, after playing 900 hours on this account and another 500 on my previous one, got to Supreme rank, haven't been playing for 2 month, suddenly they decided to vacban me for no reasons at all! WTH is this guys!! I just opened my steam account to play this game today just wanted to have some fun and now am banned.... this is really unacceptable as we can't appeal when we know it's a false ban...
i recommed with the stupid cheaters
